Hi and welcome to our page! Simply Stated Creations is a mother-daughter duo that handcrafts bath and body products for busy mamas and their families.

Our Story
This adventure began in the end of 2014 by us trying to make our own bath products to cut out the junk that can often be found in certain products. Chrissy was getting ready to start a family and in the process, stubbled across clean eating and clean living. She soon became obsessed with ingredients and finding better alternatives for the family.

Our initial products were solely made with essential oils and the bare minimum ingredients. Slowly friends and family caught on and began asking us to make them body butters and sugar scrubs. Before we knew it, the requests rolled in for more than essential oils. Friends were asking if we could make a product smell like their favorite perfume or if their kids could have a cotton candy scented bath bomb.

We've spent the last several years attending conferences, seminars, and trainings to ensure we are formulating and labeling safely and correctly. Our products and brand are constantly evolving and improving!
